name: Hunting Ground (TinkerSpider)
description:
Hunting Ground!

Imagine waking up in a large field of strange flora with a closed gate in the middle.
Stripped off all posessions, forced to gather resources to craft the tools you need to hunt and kill all creatures to open the gate.

Sports 35 levels with progressively weirder creatures and increasing numbers.

Incorporates a day/night cycle grabbed directly from system time, a large variety of creatures with each their own special abilities and stats.

Comes with auto-save and three difficulty settings.

Get out there and survive!
